external_games.name: A Cat's Night 2: Orazio goes to town

name: A Cat's Night 2: Orazio goes to town
storyline:
The game takes place a few months after the first A Cat's Night. 
Now Orazio lives in the city of Forlì with a nice family and other cats. 
But the streets of Forlì are not safe for dogs and cats: a group of evil people kidnaps the animals and take them away on their white van. 
The Feline Council decides to ask for help: they call the hero of the Emergenza Randagi shelter, Orazio!
summary:
The game takes place a few months after the first A Cat's Night. 
Now Orazio lives in the city of Forlì with a nice family and other cats.

The Feline Council decides to ask for help: they call the hero of the Emergenza Randagi shelter, Orazio!
